updateContentCommand: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && curl -fsSLo "${s=$(mktemp)}" https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v3.31.5/cmake-3.31.5-linux-x86_64.sh && chmod +x "$s" && sudo "$s" --prefix=/usr --skip-license && sudo bash -c "$(wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm.sh)" bash all
